A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: After watching the movie and having time to process it I can really appreciate what it is. People are going to bash it and that's understandable but at the same time you need to realize things needed to change. Luke's story needed to end to progress and make the last one more about the relationship between Kylo and Rey. It is a very different Star Wars from what we're use too but a good change and something new.
